name: Emergency Hero - Flood Rescue
description: flood is one of the most dangerous natural disasters. it happens when excessive water is collected in any area of the city. it usually happens due to heavy rainfall. the city is highly prone to floods. the rescue teams are busy to save the citizen into the flood game. there are many regions in the city that face the flood escape because the water overflowing of rivers. moreover, it also happens when the melting of snow. another reason for floods is when the dam breaks down. in this game, rescue teams shared his boat with another for the life-saving of people. be brave as a hero and drive your boat above the water in cities and rescue the people from one city to another city. complete the rescue missions of saving the citizens within a given time in flood emergency rescue. the rescue force train the new teams for the flood. this flood damages the living conditions and it takes a lot of time to recover from this disaster. the rescue simulator game is full of fun and life-saving game. you will play these rescue missions game and enjoy a lot.
